actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit installment payments of the tax attributable to certain sales of farms and other businesses by individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual to pay the tax attributable to a qualified business sale in seven equal annual installments.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit installment payments of the tax attributable to certain sales of farms and other businesses by individuals.
